title: PREFER THE RAIN
lyrics:
Thought that you were different when I met you
Turns out that you're nothin' but the same
'Cause I had higher expectations
Ooh
Still I can't help but miss you

I'd rather get hurt again

It's these personal issues

I think I prefer the rain, rain, rain



(I just)

Wish that I could fall asleep

But I texted you, I ain't heard a peep

I was a Brad Pitt and you were Jolie

Yah-aye



I thought that you were different when I met you

Turns out you're nothin' but the same

I just had higher expectations

Ooh



Still I can't help but miss you

I think I just like the pain

It's these personal issues

I think I prefer the rain, rain, rain



If you wanna go somewnhere

Then we can go somewhere

You know I

We just gotta talk it out

We gotta know each other

You know I



Sorry you a problem

Don't go no other way to solve it

I was hoping I could buy you house in the hills

Expense you with expensive shit

I could get a diamond ring

Anything to make you stay

You could be my only one

Yeah I should be your only one

I, I



(Besides)

I can't help but miss you

I think I just like the pain

It's these personal issues

I think I prefer the rain, rain, rain



I just had higher expectations (Yeah)

I just had higher expectations
